casebody.data:
EDMOND L. VILES v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45416] [95 C. Cls. 591;

317 U. S. —]

Relief to persons erroneously convicted in Federal Courts.

Decided January 5, 1942; plaintiff’s petition dismissed on defendant’s plea to the jurisdiction of the Court of Claims. Plaintiff’s motion for new trial overruled April 6,1942.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 12,1942.
